title: Cyclone bears down on flood-hit Kenya, Tanzania

Beaches were deserted and many shops closed on Saturday as heavy rains and win… [+3845 chars]
de: Zyklon wütet über der von Überschwemmungen heimgesuchten Region Kenia und Tansania. title: NOAA to release 2024 hurricane outlook today. Season to begin in 10 days.

title: Atlantic Hurricane Season Set To Break Records Amid 'Perfect Storm'

en: Atlantic Hurricane Season Set To Break Records Amid 'Perfect Storm'. Scientists have predicted that this hurricane season could see between 17 to 25 named storms.
la: Atlantic Procellae Season Set abrumpere Records Inter 'Perfectum Tempestatem'. Scientes praedixerunt hoc tempus tempestatum inter 17 ad 25 nominatas tempestates videre potuisse.

title: Four lost pregnancies. Five weeks of IVF injections. One storm.
description: A couple spent years and tens of thousands of dollars trying to have a baby. Then Hurricane Ian hit.
content: This story is part of the series Expecting worse: Giving birth on a planet in crisis, a collaboration between Grist, Vox, and The 19th that investigates how climate change impacts reproductive health… [+20068 chars]
de: Vier verlorene Schwangerschaften. Fünf Wochen IVF-Injektionen. Ein Sturm. Ein Paar verbrachte Jahre und Zehntausende von Dollar damit, ein Kind zu bekommen. Dann kam Hurrikan Ian.
en: Four lost pregnancies. Five weeks of IVF injections. One storm.. A couple spent years and tens of thousands of dollars trying to have a baby. Then Hurricane Ian hit.
la: Quatuor uterum amiserunt. Quinque septimanae IVF infundi. Una tempestas. Coniuges annos consumptos et decem milia dollariorum infantem habere conantur. Tunc Procellae Ian hit.
